chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Egeanin Tamarath, p. 35—Seanchan ship captain, later a Captain of the Green. Her last name changes each time she gets promoted; her previous last names were Elidar and Sarna. She fled Ebou Dar as part of Mat's entourage; she has since married Bayle Domon, a ship captain whose ship she once boarded and looted. She no longer uses the name Egeanin; after being demoted out of the Blood by Tuon, she now uses the name Leilwin Shipless. She is currently the subject of a search by Suroth for stealing two damane. She has blue eyes. See also Domon, Bayle; Shipless, Leilwin.
